@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This is a basic form field with common functionality for
{@link TextArea} and {@link TextField}.

On every keystroke the value is synchronized with the
value of the textfield. Value changes can be monitored by listening to the
{@link #input} or {@link #changeValue} events, respectively.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {String} initial text value of the input field ({@link #setValue}).
@param.description: initial text value of the input field ({@link #setValue}).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the field is read only

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Maximal number of characters that can be entered in the TextArea.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Whether the {@link #changeValue} event should be fired on every key
input. If set to true, the changeValue event is equal to the
{@link #input} event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
String value which will be shown as a hint if the field is all of:
unset, unfocused and enabled. Set to null to not show a placeholder
text.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
RegExp responsible for filtering the value of the textfield. the RegExp gives the range of valid values. Note: The regexp specified is applied to each character in turn, NOT to the entire string. So only regular expressions matching a single character make sense in the context. The following example only allows digits in the textfield. 
field.setFilter(/[0-9]/);

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Creates the input element. Derived classes may override this
method, to create different input elements.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
left {Integer} Any integer value for the left position,
always in pixels
@param.description:
Any integer value for the left position,
always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
top {Integer} Any integer value for the top position,
always in pixels
@param.description:
Any integer value for the top position,
always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
width {Integer} Any positive integer value for the width,
always in pixels
@param.description:
Any positive integer value for the width,
always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
height {Integer} Any positive integer value for the height,
always in pixels
@param.description:
Any positive integer value for the height,
always in pixels

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map of which layout sizes changed.
@return.desc: A map of which layout sizes changed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Hook into {@link qx.ui.form.AbstractField#renderLayout} method.
Called after the contentElement has a width and an innerWidth.

Note: This was introduced to fix BUG#1585

@param.name: @param
@param.body: innerHeight {Integer} The inner height of the element.
@param.description: The inner height of the element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Event listener for native input events. Redirects the event
to the widget. Also checks for the filter and max length.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Triggers text size recalculation after a web font was loaded

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Handles the firing of the changeValue event including the local cache
for sending the old value in the event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the value of the textfield to the given value.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the current value of the textfield.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the value to the default

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for change event of content element

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Returns the current selection.
This method only works if the widget is already created and
added to the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Returns the current selection length.
This method only works if the widget is already created and
added to the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the start of the text selection

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer|null} Start of selection or null if not available
@return.desc: Start of selection or null if not available

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the end of the text selection

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer|null} End of selection or null if not available
@return.desc: End of selection or null if not available

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Set the selection to the given start and end (zero-based).
If no end value is given the selection will extend to the
end of the textfield's content.
This method only works if the widget is already created and
added to the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Clears the current selection.
This method only works if the widget is already created and
added to the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Helper to show the placeholder text in the field. It checks for all
states and possible conditions and shows the placeholder only if allowed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Helper to remove the placeholder. Deletes the placeholder text from the
field and removes the state.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates the placeholder text with the DOM

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the placeholder label and creates it if necessary.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the required state of a widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: required {Boolean} A flag signaling if the widget is required.
@param.description: A flag signaling if the widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the current required state of the widget.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} True, if the widget is required.
@return.desc: True, if the widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the valid state of the widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: valid {Boolean} The valid state of the widget.
@param.description: The valid state of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the valid state of the widget.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} If the state of the widget is valid.
@return.desc: If the state of the widget is valid.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the invalid message of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the invalid message of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the invalid message if required of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the invalid message if required of the widget.
